num = int(input())
for i in range(num):
    (num1, num2) = map(int, input().split())
    array = list(map(int, input().split()))
    array.sort()
    sum = 0
    count = 0
    for i in range(num1):
        if array[i] > 0:
            sum += array[i]
        elif array[i] < 0 and count < num2:
            sum += abs(array[i])
            count += 1
    print(sum)

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    array = list(map(int, input().split()))
    array.sort()
    sum = 0
    m = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if array[i] > 0:
            sum += array[i]
        elif array[i] < 0 and m < k:
            sum += abs(array[i])
            m += 1
    print(sum)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ans = sum(a)
    negs = [x for x in a if x < 0]
    ans -= sum(negs)
    negs.sort()
    negs = negs[:k]
    ans -= sum(negs)
    print(ans)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    nl = []
    s = 0
    for i in l:
        if i >= 0:
            s += i
        else:
            nl.append(i)
    nl = sorted(nl)
    m = len(nl)
    j = 0
    while j < k and j < m:
        s += -1 * nl[j]
        j += 1
    print(s)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, K) = map(int, input().split())
    i = list(map(int, input().split()))
    p = [p for p in i if p > 0]
    n = [n for n in i if n < 0]
    print(sum(p) - sum(sorted(n)[:K]))

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, k) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    positive = [i for i in a if i > 0]
    negative = [i for i in a if i < 0]
    negative.sort()
    for i in negative[:k]:
        positive.append(i * -1)
    print(sum(positive))

t = int(input())
for o in range(t):
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = [k for k in map(int, input().split())]
    arr.sort()
    for i in range(k):
        if arr[i] < 0:
            arr[i] = arr[i] * -1
    arr.sort()
    j = n - 1
    ans = 0
    while j >= 0 and arr[j] > 0:
        ans += arr[j]
        j -= 1
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    (n, k) = map(int, input().split(' '))
    a = list(map(int, input().split(' ')))
    arr = sorted(a)
    i = j = sum = 0
    while i < n:
        if arr[i] > 0:
            sum += arr[i]
        elif j < k:
            sum += abs(arr[i])
            j += 1
        i += 1
    print(sum)
    t = t - 1
